synonyms.synonym: Superoxide-generating NADPH oxidase light chain subunit

protein.specific_function: Critical component of the membrane-bound oxidase of phagocytes that generates superoxide. Associates with NOX3 to form a functional NADPH oxidase constitutively generating superoxide

reference.reference_text: Parkos CA, Dinauer MC, Walker LE, Allen RA, Jesaitis AJ, Orkin SH: Primary structure and unique expression of the 22-kilodalton light chain of human neutrophil cytochrome b. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1988 May;85(10):3319-23.
